name: Clawdbot Dev Container
postCreateCommand: chmod +x .devcontainer/scripts/write-env.sh && bash .devcontainer/scripts/write-env.sh && if [ -f package.json ]; then npm ci; elif [ -f requirements.txt ]; then python -m pip install -r requirements.txt; fi
postStartCommand: echo 'Codespace 已启动。若是 Node 项目，运行：npm start 或 npm run dev。若是 Python 项目，运行：python bot.py'
